Our Projects

The Hudson team is a creative group of individuals with decades of experience helping businesses flourish online. We’re strategists, designers, writers, and technologists, and while our expertise is diverse, we share the same genuine passion for creating outstanding work for our clients.

Contact Us

Why we're different

We have a virtually non-existent turnover rate, which is especially unique in the agency world. By prioritizing our people, we’ve created an environment that fosters employee growth and client success by design. Ask any one of our clients what makes working with Hudson so special, and beyond the quality and results of our work, they will tell you that our team is engaged on a level usually reserved for their internal teams.

Explore our projects

Where you come in

Whether you work with, for, or in collaboration with Hudson, you will experience what it means to be part of a team that pushes for you to succeed. Unlike most agencies, we employ a uniquely consultative approach, meaning that we will provide you with the best solutions to reach your unique business goals — whether that means helping you integrate with new, third-party platforms, launching an uncharted marketing campaign, or developing a custom web solution that transforms your customer experience. We measure success in the longevity of our client relationships, and our team’s dedication to helping businesses move beyond their comfort zones makes that possible.

services

→

360°of Digital Services Expertise

From corporate identity to website development and digital campaigns, we help brands dazzle their audience and grow their bottom line with visible results.

Find out how

Web Design

Creating memorable brands

We offer full-service creative, copy, branding and design services for businesses of all sizes and types. Whether you need a rebrand, website overhaul, or assistance creating new brand collateral, our creative team of designers, UI/UX strategists, writers, and market researchers will work together with you to bring your vision to life. We can also support your internal creative and marketing departments as your trusted team of brand and design consultants.

Web development

Building beautiful and functional websites

Your website is more than the code, we know that. Understanding your business objectives and striving to provide end-users with the best experience are of utmost importance to our team. A tailor-made website will help you achieve your business goals. Let us give you the “wow” factor!

Ecommerce solutions

Engaging, interactive ecommerce websites

Creating an engaging ecommerce shopping experience requires a truly integrated approach. Web design, copy, and functionality should all work together to guide customers toward making quick and seamless purchases. Our team can help you strike the perfect balance of intuitive UI/UX, tech integrations, and a solid ecommerce marketing strategy to drive results.

Digital Strategy

Grab your audience’s attention

The digital realm provides unprecedented opportunities for today’s businesses. We now have data to broaden anecdotal evidence, precise digital ad targeting to test assumptions about target audiences, and tools like social media which allow us to create positive brand experiences long before customers try a new product or service.

Fully Responsive Websites That Help Businesses Grow

Aside from building custom websites, JSN Projects also offers E-commerce solutions that allow businesses to sell products or services, and take online payments. We also provide SEO services that not only improve a business’ position in search results, but also ensure that the website remains at the top
